channel.title: No Country for Old Kobolds
channel.description:
It's my first Gauntlet Hangouts event!
No Country for Old Kobolds is a game in which you explore the life of kobolds—small draconian humanoids who are almost always relegated to the lowest rung of society.
Session 1 [date=2019-04-07 time=17:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-07 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_WC4QL1Rz015NGY3ek
